info.title: Tripsha API documentation
info.description: This is complete API documentation of all the API

kindOfTripHostingOverview.description: Describe type of trip you planning to host

targettingTypesOfTravelers.description: Hosting trip for kind of audience group?

isActive.description: If `isActive=true` host request is not deleted

isFavorite.description: If `true`, the user has saved this trip for future reference

isMember.description: Is member of the trip, if `true` then counted as active member of the trip

isOwner.description: Member is owner of the trip or not

updatedAt.description: The last time user interacted with the trip

isArchived.description: Trip is expired, startDate less than todays date.

queryLimit.name: limit
queryLimit.description: Limit of the records on a each page

queryInterests.name: interests
queryInterests.description: Search for interests, comma separated values. Ex. value1,value2

queryDestinations.name: destinations
queryDestinations.description: Search for destinations, comma separated values. Ex. value1,value2

queryIsMember.name: isMember
queryIsMember.description: List all the trips belong to user

queryIsFavorite.name: isFavorite
queryIsFavorite.description: List all the favorite trips of the user

queryIsPublic.name: isPublic
queryIsPublic.description: List all the public trips of the user

queryIsArchived.name: isArchived
queryIsArchived.description: List all the archived trips of the user

queryStatus.name: status
queryStatus.description: List all the trips with status

queryIsHost.name: isHost
queryIsHost.description: This will list the details as per the host permissions else it will list the details as normal user.

kindOfTripHostingOverview.description: Describe type of trip you planning to host

targettingTypesOfTravelers.description: Hosting trip for kind of audience group?

spokenLanguages.description: List of languages user can speak separated by comma

get.description: Returns list of bookings related to logged in user.
Returns a booking based on a booking ID

put.description: Updates a single booking based on the ID supplied and data

delete.description: deletes a single booking based on the ID supplied

get.description: Return list of matching host requests
Returns a host request based on a request ID

put.description: Updates a single host request based on the ID supplied, also it will update the status if request

delete.description: Deletes a single host request based on the ID supplied

post.description: Perform various operations on a member

get.description: Return list of matching interest tags
Return list of matching trip tags
Returns a trip based on a trip ID

put.description: Updates a single trip based on the ID supplied and data

delete.description: deletes a single trip based on the ID supplied

get.description: Returns a user based on a user ID

put.description: Updates a single user based on the ID supplied and data

delete.description: Deletes a single user based on the ID supplied
